_comment: Threshold parameters for the BluePhos Discovery Pipeline

_descriptions.t_nn: Threshold for the neural network (NN) score. Determines the maximum allowed absolute value for the NN score to consider a candidate.
_descriptions.t_ste: Threshold for the ste value. Determines the maximum allowed absolute value for the ste value to consider a candidate.
_descriptions.t_ed: Threshold for the energy difference (ed). Determines the maximum allowed value for the energy difference to consider a candidate.
